**Example 1: 修改项目接口示例**



Input: 

```
tccli trro ModifyProject --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --ProjectId f3glr49rc96pralw \
    --ProjectName mytest \
    --ProjectDescription test2 \
    --PolicyMode black
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "3c140219-cfe9-470e-b241-907877d6fb03"
    }
}
```
